Ignatius heard a crash when the floor collapsed, he ran to the hole and
fired five blasts from his talons toward where Halucinagen had fallen. The
enemy was now on the lavel with the crew quarters on it. Ignatius called out
to the level below activating all comms on the level, "Stop him, don't let
him escape!"

The doors to all the crew quarters on the level opened and a voice boomed
through the halls. "You are surrounded, you are ordered to return to the
bridge to accept punishment."
----- Original Message -----
